data.title: Contact Apple for support and service
data.meta_description: Find a phone number for your country or region, or start a SignTime session.
data.text:
If you use a mobile phone to call a toll-free number, you might be charged. The number might not be accessible from certain mobile network providers. For more information, contact your network provider.

PSTN local rate for Moscow, national rates for other regions. In accordance with the sanctions on the Crimea Region announced by the US Government on December 19, 2014 and European Council Regulation No 1351/2014 dated December 18, 2014, the sale of Apple products and/or provision of services related to Apple products in the Crimea Region is suspended as of February 1, 2015.
